kDesc
Ooh, nice clean paintballing gear. Not for long… \n\n Created by Double Time – Play to Win, Play Double Time. [#Legal]
Oh, quel bel équipement de paintball immaculé. Pas pour longtemps… \n\n Créé par Double Time - Jouez pour gagner, jouer Double Time. [#Legal]
Oh, eine hübsche Paintball-Ausrüstung. Nicht mehr lange …\n\n Entworfen von Double Time – Spiel für den Sieg, spiel Double Time [#Legal]
Ooh, che belle scarpe pulite. Non per molto però… \n\n Created by Double Time – Play to Win, Play Double Time. [#Legal]
Oh, qué limpia llevas la ropa de paintball. No durará mucho...\n\n Creado por Double Time; juega para ganar, juega con Double Time. [#Legal]
綺麗でおニューなペイントボールギア。だが長続きするかな？ [#Legal]
깔끔하고 멋진 페인트볼 장비. 곧 더러워지겠지만요..\n\n 더블 타임 제작 - 승리를 위한 플레이, 플레이 더블 타임 [#Legal]
Ooh, nice clean paintballing gear. Not for long… \n\n Created by Double Time – Play to Win, Play Double Time. [#Legal]
